cells.text: Protection of freedom of assembly and association
cells.text_vi: Bảo vệ Tự do Hội đồng và Hiệp hội

cells.text: Except with his or her own consent, no person shall be hindered in the enjoyment of his

cells.text: or her freedom of assembly and association, that is to say, his or her right to assemble freely and

cells.text: Protection of freedom of movement

cells.text: No person shall be deprived of his or her freedom of movement, and for the purposes
cells.text_vi: Không ai bị tước quyền tự do di chuyển của mình, và cho các mục đích
